opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: James A. Lynaugh, Interim Director, Texas Department of Corrections v. Gregory Allen Petty

opinion:
480 U.S. 699

107 S.Ct. 1596

94 L.Ed.2d 679

James A. LYNAUGH, Interim Director, Texas Department of Corrections, Petitioner,
v.
Gregory Allen PETTY

No. 85-1656

Supreme Court of the United States

March 25, 1987

ON WRIT OF

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT [March 25, 1987]

PER CURIAM.

1

The writ of certiorari is dismissed as improvidently granted.
